actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to exempt motor vehicles being used in the transportation of members of certain religious organizations from the application of the provisions of part II of such Act.

summary.text: Exempts from the motor vehicles provisions of the Interstate Commerce Act motor vehicles used in the transportation of members of any religious organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to exempt motor vehicles being used in the transportation of members of certain religious organizations from the application of the provisions of part II of such Act.
